column4: I just tried to boot the realtime kernel, and after booting my computer becomes unresponsive, what can it be?
I can switch ttys, and type my login name, but it doesn't even ask me for a password, and there's no HD activity at all
heh, pipelineaudio is one of REAPER's greatest evangelists :)
i'm using reaper on linux already ^^
should I grab libjack 0.5? or 0.1 or what?
Im just following dave's guide and grabbing whatever is newest
can I just install regular windows asio drivers with wineasio? or am I SOL if theres not a linux driver for my card?
you have to use linux native drivers for the sound card, which one do you have?
the one thats on the laptop I use for demoing reaper is some sigmatel garbage, all it needs to do is play back, but I have this really cool line6 kb37 thing that I like to take with me
but I can take a motu 8pre or 896 or traveller if need be
don't know which ones are supported, I think the motus shoudl be
